text: Cassandra Lynn Hensley (n√©e Jensen; August 15, 1979 - January 15, 2014), better known by her stage name Cassandra Lynn, was an American model. She was best known for work with Playboy. She was the Playmate of the Month for February 2006. Lynn was born in Price, Utah and raised in Salt Lake City. She was married Gary Hensley on February 7, 2009. She also had two children; a daughter, Alexis, from a previous relationship, and a son, Devin, with Hensley. Lynn died on January 15, 2014 at her friend's home in Los Angeles, California, aged 34. She was found by her friend floating in a bathtub. Her death was caused by an accidental overdose of cocaine and alcohol. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1979 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Models from Utah Category:Drug-related accidental deaths in the United States Category:Actors from Salt Lake City, Utah
title: Cassandra Lynn
